name: H1Z1 Pro League - Luminosity Gaming Team Pack
detailed_description:
Show support for your favorite H1Z1 Pro League team with the Luminosity Gaming Team Pack! Each Season One team pack contains the same H1Z1 cosmetic skin team jersey and parachute used by the players in the H1Z1 Pro League.

Sales of H1Z1 Pro League in-game items supports the teams, pro players and League operations. Show your support and represent your favorite team!

NOTE: H1Z1 Pro League team items (Helmet, Backpack, and Jersey) cannot be used to skin another player’s items while in Fort Destiny or in a match.

short_description: Show support for your favorite H1Z1 Pro League team with the Luminosity Gaming Team Pack!  Each Season One team pack contains the same H1Z1 cosmetic skin team jersey and parachute used by the players in the H1Z1 Pro League.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish, Korean, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 280 series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
